thread.section_title: Days Hotel London- Waterloo - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Family visit
thread.title_full: Family visit - Review of Days Hotel London- Waterloo, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: nessa22279
title: Family visit
text:
The reception staff were polite and helpful when we arrived. We had two rooms booked but the lights didn't work in one of the rooms but we were given a new room quickly. The rooms were clean and tidy.
We didn't have a meal here but we ate off the snack menu later in the evening and it was satisfactory. Breakfast was full English or cerial, toast, crossaints etc.
The only two things we could moan about was having to pay Â£20 for parking and the cleaners in the morning stood in the corridor taking on their phones loudly in foreign language.
